notes:
They were replaced by [[Modified Gnarlhound]] with [[Updates/9.6|Summer Update 2012]]. They wouldn't die even when their life bar indicated all its life was gone.

{{JSpoiler|You needed to complete the [[Shadows of Yalahar Quest]] to access them.}}
abilities: {{Ability List|{{Healing|range=150-250}} (every 3 seconds during healthy stage; very slow during red stage)}}
sounds: I hope you are enjoying your sparring Sir or Ma'am!
Please feel free to hit me Sir or Ma'am!
name: Target Dummy
behaviour: It didn't fight back and it couldn't move. Although you couldn't move it, you could change the direction it faced by using the [[Challenge]] spell.
location: Formerly [[Edron]], south of [[Stonehome]], deep under [[Telas]]'s house.
strategy: Stand still and attack it. You can train your [[Shielding]] by using a [[Spellwand]] from [[Hoaxette]].
